name: William PIERCE, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA SUPERIOR COURT, Respondent

parties: William PIERCE, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA SUPERIOR COURT, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of July, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Prohibition and the Application for Stay are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
William PIERCE, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA SUPERIOR COURT, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 25, 2008.
